verses.verse: A Psalm of <S%H1732>David<s%>. <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H6697>strength<s%>, which <S%H3925>teacheth<s%> my <S%H3027>hands<s%> to <S%H7128>war<s%>, and my <S%H676>fingers<s%> to <S%H4421>fight<s%>:

My <S%H2617>goodness<s%>, and my <S%H4686>fortress<s%>; my high <S%H4869>tower<s%>, and my <S%H6403>deliverer<s%>; my <S%H4043>shield<s%>, and he in whom I <S%H2620>trust<s%>; who <S%H7286>subdueth<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> under me.
<S%H3068>LORD<s%>, what is <S%H120>man<s%>, that thou takest <S%H3045>knowledge<s%> of him! or the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H582>man<s%>, that thou makest <S%H2803>account<s%> of him!
<S%H120>Man<s%> is <S%H1819>like<s%> to <S%H1892>vanity<s%>: his <S%H3117>days<s%> are as a <S%H6738>shadow<s%> that passeth <S%H5674>away<s%>.
<S%H5186>Bow<s%> thy <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and come <S%H3381>down<s%>: <S%H5060>touch<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and they shall <S%H6225>smoke<s%>.
Cast <S%H1299>forth<s%> <S%H1300>lightning<s%>, and <S%H6327>scatter<s%> them: shoot <S%H7971>out<s%> thine <S%H2671>arrows<s%>, and <S%H2000>destroy<s%> them.

<S%H7971>Send<s%> thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> from <S%H4791>above<s%>; <S%H6475>rid<s%> me, and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> me out of <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%>, from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5236>strange<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%>;
Whose <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H1696>speaketh<s%> <S%H7723>vanity<s%>, and their right <S%H3225>hand<s%> is a right <S%H3225>hand<s%> of <S%H8267>falsehood<s%>.

I will <S%H7891>sing<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7892>song<s%> unto thee, O <S%H430>God<s%>: upon a <S%H5035>psaltery<s%> and an instrument of ten <S%H6218>strings<s%> will I sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> unto thee.

It is he that <S%H5414>giveth<s%> <S%H8668>salvation<s%> unto <S%H4428>kings<s%>: who <S%H6475>delivereth<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H5650>servant<s%> from the <S%H7451>hurtful<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%>.

<S%H6475>Rid<s%> me, and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> me from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5236>strange<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%>, whose <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H1696>speaketh<s%> <S%H7723>vanity<s%>, and their right <S%H3225>hand<s%> is a right <S%H3225>hand<s%> of <S%H8267>falsehood<s%>:

That our <S%H1121>sons<s%> may be as <S%H5195>plants<s%> grown <S%H1431>up<s%> in their <S%H5271>youth<s%>; that our <S%H1323>daughters<s%> may be as corner <S%H2106>stones<s%>, <S%H2404>polished<s%> after the <S%H8403>similitude<s%> of a <S%H1964>palace<s%>:

That our <S%H4200>garners<s%> may be <S%H4392>full<s%>, <S%H6329>affording<s%> all manner of <S%H2177%H2177>store<s%>: that our <S%H6629>sheep<s%> may bring forth <S%H503>thousands<s%> and ten <S%H7231>thousands<s%> in our <S%H2351>streets<s%>:

That our <S%H441>oxen<s%> may be strong to <S%H5445>labour<s%>; that there be no breaking <S%H6556>in<s%>, nor going <S%H3318>out<s%>; that there be no <S%H6682>complaining<s%> in our <S%H7339>streets<s%>.
<S%H835>Happy<s%> is that <S%H5971>people<s%>, that is in such a <S%H3602>case<s%>: yea, <S%H835>happy<s%> is that <S%H5971>people<s%>, whose <S%H430>God<s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
